channel.title: Comments on: Inaugural UK LNUG Meeting

item.title: By: Ports
item.dc:creator: Ports
item.description: <p>You should see live Sametime code at the forthcoming events because 7.5 has entered Alpha testing internally and and external Beta program is starting soon. I'm running it and it is fantastic - and not just for the emoticons <img src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLY/$FILE/smile.gif"</a>></p>
item.content:encoded: You should see live Sametime code at the forthcoming events because 7.5 has entered Alpha testing internally and and external Beta program is starting soon. I’m running it and it is fantastic – and not just for the emoticons http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLY/$FILE/smile.gif“>

item.title: By: Kevin Grimshaw
item.dc:creator: Kevin Grimshaw
item.description: <p>If you are going to see Hannover then I wouldn't bother. All we got in London was re-cycled screenshots from Lotusphere. No live demonstrations of working code. Same with Sametime 7.5.<img src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5N3GHR/$FILE/angry.gif"</a>> <br/><br/><br/><br/>Only working code I saw was for the Workplace designer and the Bowstreet Portlet Factory.</p>
item.content:encoded:
If you are going to see Hannover then I wouldn’t bother. All we got in London was re-cycled screenshots from Lotusphere. No live demonstrations of working code. Same with Sametime 7.5.http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5N3GHR/$FILE/angry.gif“>

Only working code I saw was for the Workplace designer and the Bowstreet Portlet Factory.

item.title: By: Matt White
item.dc:creator: Matt White
item.description: <p>Sean,</p><p>I'd head over to the discussion forums at the LNUG site where there is a general discussion going on about the LSC2U event in London yesterday. I am not really the best person to ask as I wasn't there!</p><p>Matt</p>
item.content:encoded:
Sean,

I’d head over to the discussion forums at the LNUG site where there is a general discussion going on about the LSC2U event in London yesterday. I am not really the best person to ask as I wasn’t there!

Matt

item.title: By: Sean
item.dc:creator: Sean
item.description: <p>Hi, interested in your relayed comments on Lotusphere comes to you. I and soem colleagues are going to the one in manchester - it is a big committment for a small company although we are really interested to see Hannover etc..<br/><br/><br/><br/>How did anyone else rate it ?</p>
item.content:encoded:
Hi, interested in your relayed comments on Lotusphere comes to you. I and soem colleagues are going to the one in manchester – it is a big committment for a small company although we are really interested to see Hannover etc..

How did anyone else rate it ?
